name: Absolute Stickman - Zero Gravity Edition
description:
Get ready for a crazy stickman game where you try to control your stickman runner with zero gravity.

Jump up or jump upside down, it doesn't matter since there is no gravity in this game. Shoot your way through the bad guys and try to see how far you can get!

FEATURES

- Awesome stickman graphics.
- Cool sounds.
- Non stop action!
